duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct unarmed foot patrol and control access and egress.
Monitor CCTV and alarm systems, and compose reports.
Log in all visitors to the facility and notify person being visited by phone prior to visitor access.
Maintain logs of all incoming and outgoing tractors and trailers, both on paper and electronically as required.
Conduct inspections of all outgoing passenger vehicles, both visitor and employee.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
